pages.title: Complete Natural Stone Restoration Services in Los Angeles, CA| The Marble Clinic Restoration

settings.content: Complete Restoration
Countertops Refinishing
Floors Refinishing

Based in Los Angeles, CA, the Marble Clinic Restoration is a full-service restoration and maintenance company servicing different kinds of stones such as Travertine, Limestone, Terrazzo, Slate, Ceramic, Pavers, Brick, Concrete, Marble, Granite, and more. We specialize in honing, polishing, refinishing, resurfacing, and repairing natural stones such as marble. Marbles or stones that have become dull, scratched, etched, cracked, chipped, or contain dirt, grime, grout, hard water stains, or are old stones do not have to be replaced. We promise to restore your marble or stone to its original state –even better sometimes.
No matter the problem with your natural stone floors, tiles, countertops, or solid surfaces, we are capable of restoring marble or stone to their best form!

Since we are specialists in stone maintenance and care, our staff is knowledgeable in this field with lots of professional & personal experience to guarantee your stones get the best restoration services.

settings.title: Need a service & ready to book? Call us

settings.content: The company’s founders made the company with a strong passion for the care & maintenance of different stones. The Marble Clinic Restoration is based in Los Angeles, CA, specializing in polishing, repair, cleaning, sealing, honing and renovation of marble and other natural stones. We are professionals in our field and has been delivering our services since 1998 catering to our wide range of customers’ unique needs. No matter the condition or problem with your stones! We can restore, repair, resurface and renovate any natural stone, especially marbles.

Honesty & Integrity

We, as a company, believe in doing work with honesty. We will quote you very fair prices, stay true to our words, and work with dedication.

We Value our Customers

The Marble Clinic Restoration is a customer-focused business operating for our customers' benefit. We value everything our customers value: quality, affordability, high-efficiency, and punctuality.

Dedicated Professionals

Our workforce is a team of dedicated professionals who are always working hard to grow. We stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and advancements in stone works so that we can give our best to the community.

pages.title: Marble Refinishing Care & Maintenance Services in Los Angeles, CA | The Marble Clinic Restoration

settings.content: The Marble Clinic Restoration comprises stone specialists passionate about taking care of marbles and natural stones. Marble refinishing care & maintenance is what we have been doing for over two decades. During this time, our workforce has been through many unique situations and is heavily experienced in removing all sorts of grime, dirt, cracks, dulled surfaces, chips, etching, hard stains, lippage, and more from your marbles and other natural stones. Among many different services, our marble care & maintenance includes:

• Marble Repairing & Replacements
  • Honing, Cleaning, Polishing, and Refinishing
  • Hard Stain Removal

• Lippage Removal
  • Marble Cleaning & Sealing
  • High Care & Maintenace

Our highly experienced stones specialists have customized plans for the care & maintenance of your natural stones, such as marble. Our specialty maintenance plans include care for softer tiles such as travertine and limestone since they are susceptible to scratches and dull spots on the surface called “acid etching”. We protect your precious stones and marbles from such issues and provide complete care tailored to their needs.

pages.title: Natural Stone Restoration Services in Brentwood, CA | The Marble Clinic Restoration

settings.content: Nothing is more beautiful than the marble or natural stone-based interior. With the Marble Clinic Restoration, the proper maintenance and regular care will undoubtedly brighten and maintain your natural stones’ appearance. Marble Clinic Restoration provides full natural stone restoration services for Brentwood customers.

The Marble Clinic Restoration provides durable and efficient restoration with natural cleaners. The products we use are pH neutral and will not affect your natural stones’ sealings. We ensure that no bleach or acid is applied or any volatile chemicals used for cleaning.
Based on the marble condition, our experts also look for some stains that might be visible after polishing. Some of the stones require less maintenance, while some are unpolished natural stones that require regular care.

One of Marble Clinic Restoration’s prime objectives is to restore your natural stones’ original beauty and provide a durable finishing solution. We use authentic products and high-quality treatment plans to offer our customers only the best to achieve this.

We specialize in honing, polishing, refinishing, resurfacing, and repairing natural stones such as marble. Marbles or stones that have become dull, scratched, etched, cracked, chipped, or contain dirt, grime, grout, hard water stains, or are old stones do not have to be replaced. Full-Service Company

Our various services include natural stone restoration. Floor, countertops, tiles, and walls marble refinishing. Complete stone care including, honing, cleaning, sanding, polishing, sealing, and more. We also perform high-quality sealing and stain & scratch removal.

Team of Dedicated Professionals

We have a team of dedicated, highly trained, efficient, and experienced professionals. Our experts have years of experience in servicing various kinds of natural stones going through different situations. This makes us the best choice for cleaning or restoration.

Free Estimates
